Text.Page:
Congratulations on becoming eligible to enter the Temple of Temerity!

Go to Forgeheart right now and speak to {@LinkCreature:84#1203#Ebir}.

What an honor!

Kaia herself created the Temple of Temerity as a shrine to the amani fighting spirit. It's truly an inspiring place.

, you are now eligible to enter these training grounds and see for yourself. Ready to enter?
